Message:
Almost one month has passed
since the plague has spread
throughout the village.

It is the same as when
this very same disease
first attacked many years ago.

There was only one person
I was able to save back then—
Florence.

She overcame her trial
through her strength alone...

and the whole ordeal made us
the closest of friends.

Yes, God has a plan with
every trial he puts us through...

Surely, even the one
we are facing now...
That is why I continued to pray...

But as time went on,
the number of deaths only grew...

Then, after countless days
of praying, something strange
happened to my body.
